items.title: Ricursive, founded by ex-Google researchers to automate advanced chip design, raised $35M led by Sequoia at a $750M valuation and plans a product launch in 2026 (Berber Jin/Wall Street Journal)
items.summary:
Berber Jin / Wall Street Journal:
Ricursive, founded by ex-Google researchers to automate advanced chip design, raised $35M led by Sequoia at a $750M valuation and plans a product launch in 2026  —  Founded by ex-Google researchers, Ricursive raised $35 million with backing from Sequoia to automate chip design

items.title: Get EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Ultra power station + a FREE 400W solar panel at a new $3,329 low ($2,470 off)
items.summary:
Update 12/02: Wellbots has provided a new exclusive code for this DELTA Pro Ultra 400W solar bundle that drops the price even lower to $3,329.10 shipped, after using 9TO5ECOCM10 at checkout.

With Cyber Monday in full swing, over at Wellbots you can score the DELTA Pro Ultra Portable Whole-Home Backup Power Station with FREE 400W solar panel for $3,449.08 shipped, after using the code ECOBF8 at checkout, beating out the brand’s direct sale pricing that would cost you $4,178 with the event’s extra savings code. This monstrous bundle is dropping down from its $5,799 full price to $3,749, which already starts $50 under the previous low, but the deal gets all the sweeter thanks to the additional $300 that the extra savings code gets you. That’s $2,350 in total Cyber Monday savings, landing it at a new all-time low price. We also secured up to $13,289 in exclusive savings on 20 different offers revolving around EcoFlow’s latest DELTA Pro Ultra X power station that boasts greater expandability – all at new low prices starting from $174, as well as the DELTA 3 Ultra 3,072Wh power station at a new $879 low.

more…

items.title: Why is Trump threatening Venezuela's Maduro?
items.summary: We look at what is behind the deployment of a large US military force to within striking distance of Venezuela.

items.title: Venezuela approves migrant repatriation flight from U.S
items.summary: Dec 2 (Reuters) - Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has approved a migrant repatriation flight from the United States, Venezuelan authorities said on Tuesday, days after Caracas said comments by U.S. President Donald Trump had effectively halted the program. Read full story

items.title: 'Time for a deal' say some Ukrainians escaping war-ravaged Donbas
items.summary: While many Ukrainians believe they have sacrificed too much for their country to lose territory to Russia, others are desperate for the war to end.

items.title: German conservatives pass trial vote on pension reform in win for coalition
items.summary: BERLIN, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Conservative legislators in Germany voted by a large majority in favour of a contested pension reform package in what had been billed as a trial ballot ahead of a full parliamentary vote on the move, a person present at the caucus meeting said. Read full story

items.title: Former Honduran president released from U.S. prison after Trump pardon
items.summary: WASHINGTON, Dec 2 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump, who has painted himself as a warrior against illegal drugs, pardoned former Honduran President Juan Orlando Hernandez, who was released from a U.S. prison where he was serving a 45-year sentence on drug trafficking and firearms charges. Read full story

items.title: Lectric’s Cyber Week Sale continues with up to $893 holiday e-bike bundle savings from $999
items.summary:
Lectric is continuing its holiday savings event with a Cyber Week Sale that is taking up to $893 off its e-bike bundles, with today (Tuesday December 2, 2025) also being dubbed “Giving Tuesday,” where $250 from each purchase is donated to Arizona foster children. Among the lineup, the most children-focused (among other uses) is the Lectric XPedition 2.0 Cargo e-bikes that come in either a 13Ah single-battery configuration with $346 in FREE gear at $1,399 shipped, the 26Ah dual-battery configuration with $744 in FREE gear at $1,799 shipped, or the 35Ah dual-battery long-range configuration with $893 in FREE gear at $1,999 shipped. To get these e-bikes with these particular bundles would run you $1,745, $2,543, and $2,892 without the savings, which are continuing the largest bundle sizes to date for one week longer. Head below to check out the full lineup of deals while they last.

more…

items.title: Amazon launches AWS AI Factories to deploy AWS infrastructure, including AWS Trainium chips and Nvidia GPUs, in customers' data centers (Georgia Butler/DatacenterDynamics)
items.summary:
Georgia Butler / DatacenterDynamics:
Amazon launches AWS AI Factories to deploy AWS infrastructure, including AWS Trainium chips and Nvidia GPUs, in customers' data centers  —  AI Factories can be built using Nvidia or Trainium chips  —  Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched a new AWS AI Factory offering that brings AI infrastructure to customers' data centers.

items.title: World Bank says Zimbabwe's near-term economic outlook positive
items.summary: HARARE, Dec. 2 (Xinhua) -- Zimbabwe's near-term economic outlook is positive with growth anticipated to remain at 5 percent in 2026, the World Bank said Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: Nigeria grants asylum to Guinea-Bissau presidential candidate after coup
items.summary: Nigeria says it is sheltering Fernando Dias in its embassy in Bissau, citing an imminent threat to his life.

items.title: A profile of Dario Amodei and Anthropic, which is on track to hit a nearly $10B annualized run rate by the end of 2025, more than 10x what it generated in 2024 (Jeremy Kahn/Fortune)
items.summary:
Jeremy Kahn / Fortune:
A profile of Dario Amodei and Anthropic, which is on track to hit a nearly $10B annualized run rate by the end of 2025, more than 10x what it generated in 2024  —  Dario Amodei is, in his telling, the accidental CEO of an accidental business—one that just happens to be among the fastest-growing on the planet.

items.title: Apple Music Replay 2025 is back with new listening stats
items.summary: Apple Music is getting ahead of Spotify Wrapped with the launch of its yearly recaps. This year’s Apple Music Replay is available natively within the app and comes packed with even more listening stats, allowing you to review all the new artists you listened to, which ones you kept returning to, and who made a […]

items.title: Pope prays at Beirut port blast site on last day of Lebanon visit
items.summary: Pope Leo XIV demanded justice for the more than 200 victims of the disaster, at the end of his three-day visit to Lebanon.

items.title: Pope Leo urges US not to attempt military ouster of Venezuela's Maduro
items.summary: ABOARD THE PAPAL FLIGHT, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Pope Leo urged U.S. President Donald Trump's administration on Tuesday not to try to oust Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro using military force. Read full story

items.title: An interview with AWS CEO Matt Garman on his AI vision, how he plans to extend Amazon's cloud market lead, adding AI to AWS services, AI efficiencies, and more (Maxwell Zeff/Wired)
items.summary:
Maxwell Zeff / Wired:
An interview with AWS CEO Matt Garman on his AI vision, how he plans to extend Amazon's cloud market lead, adding AI to AWS services, AI efficiencies, and more  —  As Google and Microsoft continue to surge, the AWS chief lays out his pitch: cheaper, reliable AI delivered at hyperscale.

items.title: OpenAI slammed for app suggestions that looked like ads
items.summary: OpenAI said the app suggestion was only a test and not a paid ad.

items.title: Discord users can now buy in-game items without leaving the platform
items.summary: Discord users can now purchase digital game items directly within the platform, create wishlists, and send gifts through DMs.

items.title: At the moment he was elected, Pope Leo told God: 'You're in charge'
items.summary: ABOARD THE PAPAL FLIGHT, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Pope Leo revealed on Tuesday that at the moment of his election as leader of the 1.4 billion-member Catholic Church, he turned to God with a simple message: "You're in charge and you lead the way". Read full story

items.title: Anker’s new desktop docking station has a removable USB-C hub you can take with you
items.summary: Anker has released a new docking station that eliminates the  problem of having to choose between portability and a plethora of ports. The 13-in-1 Anker Nano Docking Station includes various USB and video ports so you can quickly connect a laptop to multiple monitors, but its most useful feature is a small, portable USB-C hub […]

items.title: Amazon debuts three frontier agents: Kiro autonomous agent, AWS Security Agent, and AWS DevOps Agent, each focused on a different aspect of software development (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)

items.title: Large quantities of German ammunition stolen from lorry
items.summary: The theft reportedly took place after the driver left his truck in an unguarded parking lot overnight.

items.title: The Switch 2 is still on sale at Walmart if you missed out during Cyber Monday
items.summary: One of the biggest surprises of Cyber Monday was the excellent discount we saw on the Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World bundle, which dropped the price of Nintendo’s latest console by $50. We expected the price to return to normal once the shopping holiday ended, but — surprise, surprise — it’s still going […]

items.title: YouTube releases its first-ever recap of videos you’ve watched
items.summary: YouTube Recap features a set of up to 12 different cards that highlight a user's top channels, interests, the evolution of their viewing habits, and which personality type they fall into based on the videos they loved to watch.

items.title: AWS announces new features for its AI agent platform Bedrock AgentCore, including new tools for managing AI agent boundaries and memory capabilities (Rebecca Szkutak/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
Rebecca Szkutak / TechCrunch:
AWS announces new features for its AI agent platform Bedrock AgentCore, including new tools for managing AI agent boundaries and memory capabilities  —  Amazon Web Services (AWS) is bulking up its AI agent platform, Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, to make building and monitoring AI agents easier for enterprises.

items.title: Get $1,620 exclusive savings on EcoFlow’s DELTA 3 Ultra 3,072Wh power station at a new $879 low
items.summary:
Holiday savings are still running strong, as we have secured an exclusive deal from Wellbots on EcoFlow’s DELTA 3 Ultra Portable Power Station for $879 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5ECOCM120 at checkout, beating the brand’s current Cyber Week sale pricing by $220. Coming down from its $2,499 price tag, we saw this new model drop as low as $999 between its launch in late September and today. That rate is getting beaten out by the combined $1,620 exclusive markdown here, which lands it lower than ever for the best price we have tracked. You can also find new Cyber Monday continuing lows on the DELTA Pro Ultra 400W solar bundle, as well as 20 various offers on the latest DELTA Pro Ultra X power station and bundles.

more…

items.title: AWS launches Nova Forge, a $100,000/year service allowing clients to customize Amazon's AI models at various stages of training and refine open-weight models (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
items.summary:
Jordan Novet / CNBC:
AWS launches Nova Forge, a $100,000/year service allowing clients to customize Amazon's AI models at various stages of training and refine open-weight models  —  Amazon has found a way to let cloud clients extensively customize generative AI models.  The catch is that the system costs $100,000 per year.

items.title: A data breach at analytics giant Mixpanel leaves a lot of open questions
items.summary: We sent over a dozen questions to Mixpanel's CEO about the company's data breach. Here's what we want to know.

items.title: Sources: OpenAI is developing a new LLM, codenamed Garlic, that outperforms Gemini 3 and Claude Opus 4.5 in coding and reasoning tasks, per internal evaluations (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
items.summary:
Stephanie Palazzolo / The Information:
Sources: OpenAI is developing a new LLM, codenamed Garlic, that outperforms Gemini 3 and Claude Opus 4.5 in coding and reasoning tasks, per internal evaluations  —  OpenAI, which in recent weeks has appeared to fall behind Google in AI development, is fighting back with a new large language model codenamed Garlic.

items.title: STILL LIVE: Rare Cyber Monday deal knocks 25% off Nomad’s Grade 5 titanium Apple Watch bands
items.summary:
Nomad’s Black Friday sale has already proven to be one of the better chances to save on just about all of it sought-after gear in recent memory, not the least of which because of the regular slate of timed daily deals. Today, presumably for the final special sale of the event, it is offering a solid 25% off its premium titanium Apple Watch bands to elevate your Apple wearable to new heights – we rarely see these bands on sale, and almost never down this low. 

more…

items.title: AWS re:Invent 2025: How to watch and follow along live
items.summary: Amazon Web Services’ big annual event, re:Invent 2025, is getting into full swing in Las Vegas this week, and you can follow the keynotes live right here.

items.title: Amazon starts testing ‘ultra-fast’ 30-minute deliveries
items.summary: The new "ultra-fast" delivery option will allow Amazon to better compete with services like DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Instacart.

items.title: AWS launches DevOps Agent, an AI-enabled tool designed to help clients quickly identify root causes of outages and implement fixes, available in preview (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
items.summary:
Jordan Novet / CNBC:
AWS launches DevOps Agent, an AI-enabled tool designed to help clients quickly identify root causes of outages and implement fixes, available in preview  —  Amazon's cloud unit on Tuesday announced AI-enabled software designed to help clients better understand and recover from outages.

items.title: Amazon launches second generation of its Nova AI models, including Nova Lite, Nova Pro, Nova Sonic, and Nova Omni, a fully multimodal reasoning model (Will Knight/Wired)
items.summary:
Will Knight / Wired:
Amazon launches second generation of its Nova AI models, including Nova Lite, Nova Pro, Nova Sonic, and Nova Omni, a fully multimodal reasoning model  —  Nova Forge lets Amazon's customers train frontier models for different tasks—a potential breakthrough in making AI actually useful for businesses.

items.title: Amazon launches the Trainium3 UltraServer, powered by the 3nm Trainium3 AI training chip, and teases Trainium4, which will be able to work with Nvidia's chips (Julie Bort/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
Julie Bort / TechCrunch:
Amazon launches the Trainium3 UltraServer, powered by the 3nm Trainium3 AI training chip, and teases Trainium4, which will be able to work with Nvidia's chips  —  Amazon Web Services, which has been building its own AI training chips for years now, just introduced a new version known as Trainium3 that comes with some impressive specs.

items.title: China's central bank injects liquidity through multiple tools in November
items.summary: BEIJING, Dec. 2 (Xinhua) -- The People's Bank of China (PBOC), the country's central bank, injected liquidity into the market using multiple tools in November, it said in a statement on Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: Amazon launches Trainium3, saying the AI chip is 4x faster than Trainium2 and can cut AI training and operating costs by up to 50% compared to equivalent GPUs (Robbie Whelan/Wall Street Journal)
items.summary:
Robbie Whelan / Wall Street Journal:
Amazon launches Trainium3, saying the AI chip is 4x faster than Trainium2 and can cut AI training and operating costs by up to 50% compared to equivalent GPUs  —  The company will start selling its Trainium3 processors as AI companies are looking to diversify their supply of data-center chips

items.title: Romania seeks judicial pension reform again after first try thwarted
items.summary: BUCHAREST, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Romania's government sought fast-track parliamentary approval on Tuesday for a bill raising the retirement age for judges and prosecutors and capping their pensions after the top court struck down its first attempt. Read full story

items.title: Anker’s extended SOLIX Cyber Monday Sale offers power station savings up to 65% starting from $150
items.summary:
Update 12/02: As expected, Anker SOLIX has extended its Black Friday/Cyber Monday Sale through the rest of the week for prolonged savings.

Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

items.summary:
Hayden Field / The Verge:
A look at Anthropic's societal impacts team, which broadly studies AI's impacts and finds and publishes “inconvenient truths”, building on most AI safety teams  —  Spoiler: the nine-person team works for Anthropic. … One night in May 2020, during the height of lockdown, Deep Ganguli was worried.

items.summary: Simular, a startup building AI agents for Mac OS and Windows, has solved the AI hallucination problem in a compelling way.

items.summary: AWS has been building its own AI chips – and systems – for years now. It just released its third version, known as Trainium3 with some impressive specs.

items.title: AWS announces new capabilities for its AI agent builder
items.summary: AWS is introducing new capabilities for its AI agent-building platform, including memory and evaluation tools.

When I leave the house it’s never without my everyday carry kit that, among other things, includes wireless earbuds, a small battery, extra glasses — and a flashlight. In fact, I’ve long been on the hunt for what I consider […]

items.title: You can still score Apple Watch Series 11 Cyber Monday Amazon all-time lows from $329 (if you’re quick)
items.summary:
Alongside the ongoing and particularly amazing 45% price drop on AirPods 4 with ANC at $99, we are also still seeing some of the Apple Watch Series 11 Cyber Monday all-time lows live at Amazon. Configuration options are starting to jump back up in price as of this morning though, so you’ll want to get in there as soon as possible if you want to score the special holiday pricing.

items.title: UMK PhD student killed after car plunges into lake at Jeli Campus
items.summary: KOTA BHARU: A Universiti Malaysia Kelantan (UMK) doctoral student was killed while his friend was injured after their car skidded before plunging into a lake in Jeli Campus, on Tuesday evening (Dec 2). Read full story

items.title: EcoFlow launches extended Cyber Week Sale with up to 80% discounts, extra savings, free gifts – all from $75
items.summary:
The official dates for Black Friday and Cyber Monday may have passed, but that doesn’t mean the savings train has pulled out of the station, as EcoFlow has launched its Cyber Week Sale with up to 80% continued savings on power stations, alongside free gifts and bonus savings using the code 25EFBFAFF at checkout. Among the offers, you’ll find the brand’s latest DELTA 3 1000 Air Portable Power Station down at $309 shipped, which comes with a FREE waterproof bag ($99 value), but sadly isn’t eligible for the extra savings code. We saw this new model launch early last month during early Black Friday sales with $200 cut from its $499 full tag price. While it’s not returning to that launch rate, if you missed out, you’re still getting the next-best price that sits only $10 higher. Head below for more on this new backup power solution and browse the entire sale lineup while it lasts through the rest of the week.

more…

items.title: Putin threatens to 'cut Ukraine off from the sea' after attacks on tankers
items.summary: MOSCOW, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin threatened on Tuesday to sever Ukraine's access to the sea in response to drone attacks on tankers of Russia's "shadow fleet" in the Black Sea. Read full story

Barcelona-based Titan OS, which provides a smart TV operating system to TV makers like Philips and JVC, raised a €50M Series A led by Highland Europe  —  TV makers need to get more lifetime value from a customer after selling a unit.  With more competition in the market …

items.title: US Navy admiral ordered second  deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
items.summary: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

In fact, some of the most popular deals, like the discounts on the Oura Ring 4, AirPods 4, and Nintendo Switch 2 are still sitting at their Cyber Monday prices. Although, given the […]

items.title: Mistral closes in on Big AI rivals with new open-weight frontier and small models
items.summary: Mistral unveils its Mistral 3 lineup, including a frontier model and efficient small models designed for offline, customizable enterprise use — aiming to prove small, fine-tuned AI can beat closed-source giants.

items.title: A Sam’s Club Membership is now only $25 (Reg. $50)
items.summary:
Keeping up with groceries and household supplies gets tiring if you’re stopping at different stores every week. It’s also a great way to burn through a tank of gas. If you want another option, getting a Sam’s Club membership gives you the chance to do all your shopping under one roof. Right now, a 1-Year Sam’s Club Membership is also only $25 (reg. $50).

more…

items.title: Axiado, which is making a chip designed to save space and power in AI servers, raised $100M led by Maverick Silicon (Stephen Nellis/Reuters)
items.summary:
Stephen Nellis / Reuters:
Axiado, which is making a chip designed to save space and power in AI servers, raised $100M led by Maverick Silicon  —  Axiado, a Silicon Valley-based startup that is making a chip designed to save space and power in artificial intelligence servers, said on Tuesday it has raised $100 million in fresh capital.

items.title: Titan OS raises $58 million from Highland Europe for its smart TV OS
items.summary: Titan OS aims to expand its independent TV operating system in Europe and Latin America.

items.title: Amazon now undercutting Galaxy Tab S10 FE/+ Black Friday deals at up to $200 off, or $350 off w/ trade
items.summary:
We spotted some solid on Samsung’s mid-range Galaxy Tab S10 FE and FE+ during the Black Friday festivities, some of which are still alive and well down below, but we wanted to specifically highlight the most affordable models this morning – Amazon has now undercut the previous prices Black Friday we featured and is delivering them at up to $200 off the lists.

This new AI model was potentially 10 times more advanced than any other of its […]

items.title: Apple gadgets, ranked
items.summary: Apple makes a lot of gadgets. Most of them are very good! You'd frankly be hard-pressed to find a company with a better track record, especially across so many categories. But only one Apple gadget can be the best Apple gadget, and it's time for us to decide which one it is. On this episode […]

items.title: “Players are selfish”: Fallout 2’s Chris Avellone describes his game design philosophy
items.summary: Avellone recaps his journey from learning on a TRS-80 to today.

items.title: 30 practical smart home gifts that make everyday life a little easier
items.summary: Smart home products are all about making everyday life a little easier, which is why they're some of the best and most thoughtful gifts you can give. Some people go all out building a multi-gadget IoT kingdom (like our resident smart home expert, Jen Pattison Tuohy), but a smart home is whatever your recipient wants […]

items.title: Metroid Prime 4 excels when it’s actually being Metroid
items.summary: When Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is good, it's good. The latest in Nintendo's sci-fi exploration franchise, and the first since Metroid Dread in 2021, Beyond captures the moody sense of isolation and discovery that has been so core to Metroid since it debuted in 1986. Those quiet moments truly make you feel all alone on […]

items.title: Zambian-American influencer sentenced to 18 months for hate speech
items.summary: Known as "One Boss Lady",  Ethel Chisono Edwards has become known for her rants about the president.

While our gigantic list of App Store Black Friday/Cyber Monday deals has dwindled, there are some new titles on sale today and a sizable collection of offers still live from over the last week. Those hangover deals join an ongoing deal on AirPods 4 with ANC down at $99 – one of the best Black Friday deals we tracked this year – alongside as much as $250 off M4 MacBook Air and M5 MacBook Pro as well as this discount on M4 Mac mini from $479. As for the apps, everything awaits below.

items.title: Hangover Cyber Monday Switch/PS5 game deals still live: Spider-Man 2, Hell is Us, Silent Hill 2, Mafia, more
items.summary:
Black Friday and Cyber Monday are (for the most part) long gone now, but there are some great deals still live on console games and Walmart has officially extended its Cyber Monday sale for (what appears to be) one more day. Down below you’ll find an updated list of some PS5 and Switch games we are still tracking on sale for Cyber Monday hangover day – just note these deals could be gone at any minute.

items.title: Apple Music’s Replay 2025 is here
items.summary: This year, Apple Music Replay includes even more listening habits, including the "Discovery" section, which highlights new artists users listened to, and "Loyalty," which spotlights artists that users have kept coming back to each year.

items.title: Black Friday deals on M4 MacBook Air and M5 Pro are starting to disappear, get in there while they are still $250 off
items.summary:
Apple’s latest M4 MacBook Air lineup and the brand new M5 MacBook Pro saw some big-time price drops for Black Friday and Cyber Monday this year, and the deals are beginning to disappear. Some of the colorways on the M4 MacBook Air configurations at $250 off are completely out of stock at Amazon now, with much of the same on the $250 price drops on the M5 MacBook Pro – if you’re looking to land either of them at the Black Friday price you’ll want to it now while you still can. 

more…

items.title: New all-time low for Cyber Monday still live: Just $32 for this ultra-thin 0.2-inch metal 5K power bank with built-in USB-C
items.summary:
LISEN 0.2-inch 5,000mAh power bank

Buy for $32 (Reg. $50)

What we love

This ultra-thin LISEN power bank matches the latest iPhone Air’s 0.2-inch slim profile and comes in a credit card-style design with a metal build. Despite its slim profile, though, this unit packs a 5,000mAh battery and includes a built-in braided USB-C cable, so you can charge on the go without carrying anything extra.

items.title: Walmart’s extended 2025 Cyber Monday sale delivers up to $900 off RTX 50-series gaming laptops, deals from $290
items.summary:
Walmart has extended its Cyber Monday sale, and it’s continuing to deliver major deals across Apple products, LEGO sets, TVs, toys, and more. You’ll also find steep discounts on gaming laptops running the latest RTX 50-series GPUs, with savings of up to $900. There are a bunch of solid gaming laptops discounted right now as part of the sale with prices starting at just $290, and we’ve highlighted some of our favorites below.

more…

items.title: Amazon just undercut the Black Friday/Cyber Monday price on Galaxy Buds 3 Pro, now at $140 (Reg. $250)
items.summary:
Samsung has officially transitioned over to its Cyber Week sale, as we detailed this morning, but today Amazon has undercut the official Black Friday/Cyber Monday pricing on Galaxy Buds 3 Pro. We spotted Samsung offering them down at $170 with a FREE $30 case for $110 in total savings, and that deal is still live, but Amazon has now undercut its own Black Friday low as of this morning and is listing them down at $139.99 shipped – the best price of the season. 

more…

items.title: Amazon Music’s 2025 Delivered is now here to compete with Spotify Wrapped
items.summary: Amazon Music's 2025 Delivered introduced new badges for listeners to show off. For example, the  “Headliner” badge recognizes fans who fall in the top percentage of an artist’s listeners.

items.title: Super rare deal still live on DJI’s Osmo Pocket 3 Standard/Creator bundles: Up to $310 off for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
Update 12/2: This deal is still live at Best Buy.

As part of its ongoing Cyber Monday sale, Best Buy is offering the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 4K handheld vlogging camera for $529.99 shipped. The retailer is even throwing in a FREE $25 gift card to make the deal even sweeter for Cyber Monday. This camera originally launched at $519, but it jumped up to around $800 after a series of price hikes over the last few months. It has rarely seen any discounts since it jumped up, and today’s Cyber Monday deal delivers a full $270 off – also matched at B&H as part of its Cyber Monday sale. The Creator Combo, which also climbed in price over the past year, is discounted to $669.99 shipped with a solid $310 Cyber Monday discount as well. This is the lowest we have seen this model and its Creator bundle fetch to date, outside a few limited Costco members-only promos since the hike, making this a great time to jump in if you’ve been waiting to pick up this vlogging camera. Head below for more details.

items.title: SITE NEWS: How to contact Techmeme about news
items.summary:
Given that our contact points have evolved over the years, here's a general update on how best to tip us, advise us, or complain to us about news. This post is organized around several scenarios, which I'll list in bold.

You want to send an announcement just as an FYI to Techmeme: In the typical scenario, in which you think Techmeme is unlikely to feature the news, or you're not familiar with our criteria for posting, it's best not to do anything. Techmeme only posts about 50 headlines per day and any given announcement is very unlikely to be featured. So save us both time and focus on more fruitful channels than Techmeme.

You want to send news to Techmeme that you think there's a good chance we'll want to post: If you're familiar with Techmeme and anticipate we'll be interested in the story, you can tip the link using this online form. This form integrates into editors' workflow so human editors will see the link in real time. As a bonus, the form requests an email address, enabling us to notify you if we do post the link. For the (hopefully rare) bad actor out there, I need to stress that all submissions are fully vetted by human editors, so any spamming attempt will silently fail.

You want to add a social link underneath news that is already featured on Techmeme: We often feature related blog posts and social posts from LinkedIn, X, Bluesky, Threads, and Mastodon beneath our headlines, and you are encouraged to contribute these links. Just hover over the headline on our desktop page and click the "Add Link Here" button that appears. (For an example, see the image below.) As long as the link you submit adds value in some way, we will add it, and you'll get an email confirming this once we do. Feel free to tip your own links or links from your company, clients, or friends. As long as the link makes Techmeme better, it's a win/win for you and us. (Once again, I must stress that for the rare bad actor, all submissions are fully vetted, and spammy links will not make it to Techmeme.)


You are briefing publications on embargoed news and want to let Techmeme know: Larger companies often give us a heads-up on major announcements, because it helps us post as soon as possible after the embargo and arrange more comprehensive coverage. Because embargoed news isn't public yet, there's no link for it, so you can't submit via our online form. So instead, you can submit details via this special email address. To ease the process for both companies and Techmeme, our policy is to automatically accept embargoed information sent to this email address, meaning we won't publish any information sent to us until it's public. So please don't start off by asking if we accept. Yes, we accept, and have handled embargoes from the biggest tech companies for over a decade without incident. When you email, please include as much detail as you can, including the embargo time, any blog posts or press releases, and specifics on the publications you've briefed. Note that this email address will reach a person who then routes the news to a limited set of editors. (It is not an alias that simply forwards to all editors.) Because of this we request you email 12 or more hours before the embargo time if possible.

Techmeme posted something erroneous or misleading and you want to let us know: Occasionally we flub a headline, or mention a detail from a story that was later corrected unbeknownst to us. In scenarios like this, we definitely want to know so we can fix our headline, or, less commonly, remove or replace our headline, so please use this email address to reach us. Note that you can also use this email address for sending other information or even news tips that can't easily be conveyed by a single URL (making it hard to use this form.) Please note that while we always read these emails, in many cases, we don't have time to reply.

As a bonus, here are a few non-editorial scenarios for contacting us: to place ads on Techmeme, email us here, to inquire about our media monitoring and summary services, email us here, and for matters unrelated to all of the above, use this email address.
